kodkod.engine.config

Interface Reporter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReporter, ConsoleReporter

    public interface Reporter
    Enables passing of messages between the kodkod engine and the client about the following stages of the analysis:
    1. symmetry detection
    2. bounds and formula optimization (breaking of predicate symmetries, predicate inlining and skolemization)
    3. translation to a boolean circuit
    4. symmetry breaking predicate (SBP) generation
    5. translation to cnf
    6. running a sat solver on the generated cnf
    Some of these stages may not be executed, depending on the options used for analysis.
    Author:
    Emina Torlak

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void detectedSymmetries(Set<IntSet> parts)
      Reports the symmetry partitions that were detected.
      void detectingSymmetries(Bounds bounds)
      Reports that symmetry detection started on the given bounds.
      void generatingSBP()
      Reports that the analysis is in stage 4.
      void optimizingBoundsAndFormula()
      Reports that bounds optimization is in progress (stage 2).
      void skolemizing(Decl decl, Relation skolem, List<Decl> context)
      Reports that the given declaration is being skolemized using the given skolem relation.
      void solvingCNF(int primaryVars, int vars, int clauses)
      Reports that the cnf generated in stage 6, consisting of the given number of variables and clauses, is being analyzed by a sat solver (stage 7 of the analysis).
      void translatingToBoolean(Formula formula, Bounds bounds)
      Reports that the analysis of the given (optimized) formula and bounds is in stage 3.
      void translatingToCNF(BooleanFormula circuit)
      Reports that the given (optimized) circuit is being translated to CNF (stage 5 of the analysis).

    • Method Detail

      • detectedSymmetries

        void detectedSymmetries(Set<IntSet> parts)
        Reports the symmetry partitions that were detected. The given partitions must not be mutated.

      • detectingSymmetries

        void detectingSymmetries(Bounds bounds)
        Reports that symmetry detection started on the given bounds. The given bounds must not be mutated.

      • generatingSBP

        void generatingSBP()
        Reports that the analysis is in stage 4.

      • optimizingBoundsAndFormula

        void optimizingBoundsAndFormula()
        Reports that bounds optimization is in progress (stage 2).

      • skolemizing

        void skolemizing(Decl decl,
                 Relation skolem,
                 List<Decl> context)
        Reports that the given declaration is being skolemized using the given skolem relation. The context list contains non-skolemizable quantified declarations on which the given decl depends, in the order of declaration (most recent decl is last in the list).

      • solvingCNF

        void solvingCNF(int primaryVars,
                int vars,
                int clauses)
        Reports that the cnf generated in stage 6, consisting of the given number of variables and clauses, is being analyzed by a sat solver (stage 7 of the analysis).

      • translatingToBoolean

        void translatingToBoolean(Formula formula,
                          Bounds bounds)
        Reports that the analysis of the given (optimized) formula and bounds is in stage 3. The given bounds must not be mutated.
        Ensures:
        bounds' = bounds

      • translatingToCNF

        void translatingToCNF(BooleanFormula circuit)
        Reports that the given (optimized) circuit is being translated to CNF (stage 5 of the analysis).
